data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Nayarit, Mexico.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nayarit, Mexico
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 98,649 believers find a person of peace today among the 842,750 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 941,400 citizens of Nayarit, Mexico, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Nayarit, Mexico to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Huichol people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Nayarit, Mexico to the gospel today.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Nayarit, Mexico a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Nayarit, Mexico has a population of 941,400.

We estimate Nayarit has 98,649 people who might know Jesus, 798,559 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 44,191 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Nayarit who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
